text: The Louis Dreyfus Company is a merchant company founded in 1851. It works in agriculture, food processing, international shipping, and finance. It is headquartered in Rotterdam, the Netherlands. The company has 72 offices in more than 100 countries. ==History== Louis Dreyfus Company was founded in 1851 in France. The famous Dreyfus affair was in 1895. In 2018, the company sold its metals platform to NCCL Natural Resources Investment Fund. == References == == Other websites == * Louis Dreyfus Company B.V. website * Louis Dreyfus Holding B.V. website Category:1851 establishments in Europe Category:1850s establishments in France Category:Companies of France Category:Organizations based in Rotterdam
title: Louis Dreyfus Company
